name: Oh Canada Red Berry Cobbler

ingredients.name: mixed red berries, such as raspberries and chopped strawberries

preparation: In an 8 cup baking dish, melt butter in microwave on medium heat, 45–60 sec.
In mixing bowl, using a fork, combine flour, 1⁄2 cup sugar, baking powder, and 1 tsp Cinnamon. Add milk; stir just until mixed.
Pour over melted butter in baking dish. Don’t stir.
In same mixing bowl (don’t wash), combine berries with remaining sugar and cinnamon. Pour over batter—don’t stir.
Bake until golden brown, uncovered, about 40–45 min.
tips: If you don’t have fresh berries on hand, use frozen berries.
Serve with Greek yogurt and drizzle with peanut butter.
